title: investigate why intl is not working correctly on iOS
description:
following from https://gitlab.com/minds/mobile-native/-/merge_requests/1637#note_831302733

for instance, `toLocaleString` is not transforming `25000` to `25,000`

title: refactor: more general naming for useApiPost
description:
following from https://gitlab.com/minds/mobile-native/-/merge_requests/1637#note_831290732

candidates are: useApiRequest, useApi, useApiCall.

the other point is whether useApiPost and useApiFetch should be merged. e.g. into something like useApi. 
i don't feel like they should because then we'd have a single fetch() method in the response store which doesn't make sense when we're posting something (naming-wise). but maybe we can do something about that. let's figure out

title: Check if we can standarize the keyboard handling and make a PoC
description:
### Summary

Despite mobile's keyboard handling is sometimes a cumbersome task (Even more on React-Native)

In many parts of the app, we are applying a combination of a KeyboardSpacing component and changing the SoftInputMode for android.

We should check if we can safely move the SoftInputMode logic inside the KeyboardSpacing component itself. 

The KeyboardSpacer component was necessary due to some inconsistencies between platforms of the KeyboardAvodingView and an issue detecting correctly the height of the keyboard in some devices. (At that moment, it may be no longer the case)

title: Add network_id to snowplow and cookies
description:
### Summary

We need to generate and send the networkUserId (UUID) to snowplow (Android). This UUID should be stored at the app level (shared by all the users of the device)

For both platforms, we have to add a minds_pseudoid cookie with the id

We need to ensure that sp_minds and the minds_pseudoid cookies are sent on every HTTP call

title: Android build error due missing com.github.prscX:photo-editor-android:master-SNAPSHOT
description:
### Summary

Unable to build android due to an error in one of the dependencies

```
Execution failed for task ':app:checkDebugAarMetadata'.
> Could not resolve all files for configuration ':app:debugRuntimeClasspath'.
   > Could not find com.github.prscX:photo-editor-android:master-SNAPSHOT.
```

title: (bug) 4.21.0 | App closes when pressing "back" button from comments
description:
I tried pressing "back" button from multiple spots in the app - discovery, notifications, menu, comments. When going back from discovery, notifications and menu, I went to the feed. When going back from comments, I went to the home screen (it threw me out of the app)

Video:

![XRecorder_01022022_065318](/uploads/21e02f5b0ba04681d0c6475e2d40f337/XRecorder_01022022_065318.mp4)

Reference: User Cactus_Lord here - https://www.minds.com/newsfeed/1334763669329809419

title: (bug) 4.21 Notifications | Notifications persist in unread status after reading
description:
Notifications in mobile app don't go into "read" status.

How to replicate:
- Open app
- See unread notifications, click the icon
- Click back to the feed

After those actions, the bell still has red dot next to it. When I open the notification on the mobile, and go back to the notification list, the notification still has blue dot.

Related post: https://www.minds.com/newsfeed/1334875929192697864

title: Newsfeed spinner placement
description:
The positioning of the spinner on the newsfeed is incorrect. It is currently being displayed above the header, whereas it should be position under the header. It should display in the same way as Discovery currently does.

![Screenshot_2022-01-31_at_09.14.45](/uploads/df34dea237f41722c4ace4de5bf4ab8c/Screenshot_2022-01-31_at_09.14.45.png)

cc @msantang78

title: Report comment option is not working
description:
### Summary

The report screen is failing to open when it opened from a comment

### Steps to reproduce

Open a comment of another user and tap the `report` option of the menu

### Platform information 

Android and iOS

### What is the current *bug* behavior?
Failing to open

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?
It should open the report screen

title: Discovery collapsible header
description:
### Summary

Discovery should have a collapsible header like the other screens.


### Platform information 

Android and iOS

title: [GAT] Nothing happens on tapping the Messenger menu on the Account page
description:
### Summary

Messenger option under Settings -> Accounts does not do anything. 

### Steps to reproduce

1. Launch the App and login
2. Tap on Hamburger menu>Settings>Account
3. Tap on the Messenger option"

### Platform information 

Android 11.0 11, Samsung Galaxy M11 

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Nothing happens on tapping on Messenger option

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

Messenger option if visible should be actionable.

description:

User kajinoko is unable to manage tags in Discovery, experiencing fatal error. User also cannot scroll their tags in a list, and cannot scroll horizontally through quick tags while posting. Reinstalling the app has not helped.

Google Pixel, Android 11; replicated on Samsung Note 10, Android 9

title: Notifications refresh inconsistency
description:
<!---
Please read this!

Before opening a new issue, make sure to search for keywords in the issues
filtered by the "T - Bug" label and verify the issue you're about to submit isn't a duplicate.
--->

### Summary

When refreshing notifications it is randomly showing old results.

### Steps to reproduce

- Create votes and comments to generate notifications
- Refresh the list on mobile many times
- new notifications should be shown and disappear randomly

### Platform information 
Both

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

It is showing old versions of the notifications list randomly

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

It should always show the latest notifications

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

(Paste any relevant logs - please use code blocks (```) to format console output,
logs, and code as it's very hard to read otherwise.)

### Possible fixes

Probably related to useApiFetch hook

title: Remove legacy storage for 4.22.0
description:
### Summary

Since v4.17.0, we have both versions of the local storage package and a migration logic for the session and settings.

- [ ] Remove legacy storage package
- [ ] Remove migratory
- [ ] Remove legacy wallet export
- [ ] Check if we can remove the polifills of crypto

title: Introduce Twitter Sync on mobile
description: :warning: Verify that the deep linking to create the tweet works

title: Comment input closes the bottomsheet on Android
description:
### Summary

If the user closes the bottom sheet by swiping down while the comment input is visible. The bottom sheet will fail to open the next time.

### Steps to reproduce

 - Tap on the comment icon in a post
 - Tap add comment
 - Close the bottom sheet by swiping down
 - Tap again on the comment icon to open the comments again. 
   The bottom sheet opens but it is closed down immediately 

### Platform information 
Android

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Close the bottom sheet on the next open

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

It shouldn't affect the functionality

### Possible fixes

Hide the input when the bottom sheet is closed

description: we need a way to turn experiments on and off in the app for the sake of testing different experiment variations. Something like a dev tool

We need to build and upload the IPA for each MR to BrowserStack in order to do manual testing.

title: Tags navigation not working on comments
description:
### Summary

Tags navigation is not working on comments text (Tags component) 

### Steps to reproduce

Tag a user in a comment and tap on it. 

### Platform information 
iOS and Android

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

It doesn't navigate

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

It should navigate to channel or tag search

title: Group search is not working on mobile
description:
### Summary

No results are shown when searching groups on mobile (Discovery search)

### Steps to reproduce

- Search for some common word and select the group tab on discovery

### Platform information 

Android and iOS

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Not results shown

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

It should show the same results as the web

### Possible fixes

Check endpoint and parameters to replicate web functionality

title: Small navigation related refactors
description:
@msantang78 - navigation is looking great. Just two small areas to address, then we should be all good.

- [x] Please remove the animation currently present on the menu screen. We can create a future task to add refined navigation animation in the future, but for now I'd be happy to simply remove it.

- [x] The height of the lower nav bar should be modified to better match the designs here. Currently it's a little short, and the buttons are very low. See below.

- [x] Can you please increase the size of the search and chat icons in the header, to better match the designs below. They are currently on the small side.

https://www.figma.com/proto/EkJej3mKP2lSzmWTLoqlXD/Minds-Design-System?node-id=60%3A84&scaling=scale-down&page-id=60%3A83

title: Password visibility should be added for all textboxes with password
description:
### Summary

This is an improvement request that any passwords entered across the application should have the eye button to hide/show password. This can be extremely helpful when user enters a typo in the password and can fix it easily rather than retyping the entire password. 

### Steps to reproduce

1. Navigate to Minds.
2. Go to Change Password page or any other page where password is entered in a textbox.

Notice that no eye icon exists to see the password.

### Platform information 

Android & iOS

title: Random full bleed media in moments
description: I actually prefer full bleed, but our icons are not optimized for this. In the attached image, look at bottom. Sometime it goes all the way to bottom, which i actually like. But either way we need consistency.

title: Navigation issues from comments and other bottom sheets
description:
### Summary

When navigating from some bottom sheets the screen is opened behind it.

(reported by @manishoo)

### Steps to reproduce

Open vote interaction modal and tap in a channel

### Platform information 

Android and iOS

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

The channel is opened behind the bottom sheet

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

The channel should be opened on top of the bottom sheet

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

![Untitled](/uploads/500fc0b0ac9de4d9c3a421e83b5f1b8d/Untitled.mov)

title: Update mmkv storage package
description:
### Summary

Update MMKV storage package to the latest version (0.6.8)

title: Animate tabs blue bar
description:
### Summary

Implement the animated blue bar to match the new designs
https://gitlab.com/minds/mobile-native/-/issues/3309

title: Blurhash Mobile
description:
- show a blurred image before an image fully loads
- show a blurred version of paywalled images instead of a default one

title: Wrong color of icons on ligth theme
description:
### Summary
After the new navigation changes the top bar and tab bar icon colors are incorrect for the light theme. The icon is white and it should match the primary font color

title: Comment input not visible
description:
### Summary

Comments input is behind the comments bottom sheet

### Steps to reproduce

 - Open the input to create a new comment
 - The input should be shown but is not visible
 - Close the bottom sheet and the input is visible behind

### Platform information 

Android and iOS

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

The input should be on top of everything

### Possible fixes
The bottom sheet uses teleport to render the modals on the main screen. We need to use the same (Maybe the floating input that I implemented)

title: (bug) Images | Weird aspect ratio when opening images
description:
I found out while testing the https://gitlab.com/minds/mobile-native/-/issues/4030, some pictures seem to have wrong ratio.

The sushi picture I open in the video has ratio of 1:1 but on phone it's squished. Same with the meme I open later, it should almost take full screen, but it's really squished.

It also doesn't seem to be working on all pictures. I tried some of photos made by ishiyo, and they were showing properly.

![untitled](/uploads/c4a164ad911633e0bf3b78135cfd0ed8/untitled.mp4)

## Tested on
- I have android .apk version

title: Emails with hyphens do not work on registration
description: Several users have indicated that emails do not work upon registration when they contain a hyphen.

title: Interactions bottom sheet shown in notifications
description:
### Summary

Sometimes when you return to the notifications tab the sheet is shown empty.
It happens more often on Android

### Steps to reproduce

Open notifications tab, move to another tab and return

title: Move comment bottom sheet to the main feeds
description:
<!---
Please read this!

Before opening a new issue, make sure to search for keywords in the issues
filtered by the "T - Bug" label and verify the issue you're about to submit isn't a duplicate.
--->

By adding the comment bottom sheet to the feeds we remove the need of navigating into the full post view before presenting the comments.

Remove the group conversation feature.

description:

title: Finish new navigation implementation
description:
### Summary

Most of the implementation was done in order to have a demo but there are some extra tasks we need to do in order to complete the refactor.

- [x] Move navigation types with params to each navigator (Newsfeed, Discovery, More)
- [x] Show number on the chat icon and remove the old implementation
- [x] Check/Fix deep linking
- [x] Check/Fix notification navigation
- [x] Fix typescript errors
- [x] Fix spec tests
- [x] code clean up

:warning: This task is necessary if we decide to move forward with the refactor

title: Create a POC for running Mobile Automation on Real Devices
description:
### Summary

This task covers creating a working automation test case for mobile application that tests the application on a real device. It will include researching out other options available apart from Browserstack. 

Some work on WebdriverIO + Browserstack has already been done. Compare if we can find anything better that provides stable automation across real devices.

End Result: 
- Working login test case as an example on a real Android and iOS

title: Replace reanimated indicators by react-native-animated-spinkit
description:
### Summary
The current package is crashing the app with the new version of reanimated. Given that is only used in a few places it should be pretty straight forward to replace it with react-native-animated-spinkit

Please read this!

filtered by the "T - Bug" label and verify the issue you're about to submit isn't a duplicate.

### Summary

We should delete the APK from BrowserStack once the MRs are merged in. In order to reduce the list size

Also, because BrowserStack allow to have multiple files with the same name, we should delete the previous file if it exists

title: Revised mobile login and registration action points [Creative review]
description:
Please see below a list of minor refactors to be made to the login and registration screens on mobile.

I should have caught the following before it got released. Please see below some important action items.

For reference, a click-through can be found here -> https://www.sketch.com/s/3e7a8f54-04a5-4374-8bda-9de901f2afb6/a/ygYdmgo/play

### Landing screen

- [x] General layout issues - Original design: https://www.sketch.com/s/e8802a80-da55-4421-b961-564f40bc3845/a/v8mpY2J
  - [x] The positioning of the lower buttons do not match the designs. The should be position relative to the bottom of the screen, so there is less white space between the lower button and the bottom of the screen.
![Screenshot_2021-12-17_at_13.00.17](/uploads/4da35cedfeb13422bda60813beaa316b/Screenshot_2021-12-17_at_13.00.17.png)
  - [x] The size and positioning of the Minds logo isn't quite right.

### Registration
- [x] General layout issues - Original design: https://www.sketch.com/s/e8802a80-da55-4421-b961-564f40bc3845/a/Gm5EDg5
  - [x] On iOS (iPhone 13) the Join Minds button is hidden behind the keyboard. The user is unable to scroll, but then had to close the keyboard to continue.
    - [x] Disable word auto complete above the keyboard which is consuming quite a bit of space. Also the emoji keyboard and speech to text controls could be disabled.
    - [ ] Adjust the height of the text inputs so they match the designs. They are taller in the implementation. 
    - [x] Fix the colour issue at the top of the action sheet. ![Screenshot_2021-12-17_at_13.13.00](/uploads/b48c5c0023aea18c63207ff5c26edbce/Screenshot_2021-12-17_at_13.13.00.png)
- [x] Functional issues
  - [x] When trying to register an existing username, I'm able to proceed to the CAPTCHA screen. The user shouldn't be able to proceed beyond the registration screen without all the validation criteria being met.
  - [x] Inline form validation messaged doesn't appear when no password is provided.

### Login screen

- [x] The incorrect username/password toast notification should only display when a username and password has been provided.
- [x] There should be inline form validation messages displayed (same as registration) if either the username or password has been omitted.
- [x] The spacing under the header should be increased to match the general action sheet design.

### Password reset

- [x] When transitioning from screen one to screen 2, we should persist the height of the modal, so there is no jump.
- [x] The implementation of password reset don't match the designs (https://www.sketch.com/s/3e7a8f54-04a5-4374-8bda-9de901f2afb6/a/AxYA3wr/play)
  - [x] The header text size seems to be off.
  - [x] The close icon (top right) seems a little misaligned and is the wrong colour.
  - [x] Missing the border under the header 
  - [x] Missing the drag down indicator at the top of the modal.

![Screenshot_2021-12-17_at_14.21.48](/uploads/5bb79f560d03d5eccba6e0ce81306f47/Screenshot_2021-12-17_at_14.21.48.png)

- [x] Back navigate icon not working very well. I need to tap multiple times for this to function.
- [x] The header text size seems to be off.
- [x] The close icon (top right) seems a little misaligned and is the wrong colour.
- [x] Missing the border under the header 
- [x] Missing the drag down indicator at the top of the modal.

![Screenshot_2021-12-17_at_14.25.45](/uploads/cb68105643fa8c5b31d5e72f0ca3d972/Screenshot_2021-12-17_at_14.25.45.png)

cc @msantang78 @manishoo @tanyatech

title: [GAT-MDS-7-1] Unable to connect the Wallet due to phone verification flow failure.
description:
Component:
Wallet

Steps to reproduce:
Launch the app.
Login to the account.
Tap the "Wallet" icon on the top right of the screen.
Tap the "Connect Wallet" button.
Type the "2408011889" in the "Phone Number" input field.
Tap the "Send Verification Code" button.
Type in the confirmation code from SMS.
Tap the "Confirm" button.
Observe the "Phone Verification" screen. 

Severity:
High

Attachments:
https://tracker.testerwork.com/image_files/a6bbbc732e1531002f370dea96631afe72ebea99f54e0a7a4ca16a7433523718566521dfaa6273f4710fdb9db31d7189, https://tracker.testerwork.com/video_files/ec126509310b1722a133b0abf2a4952c68d16726d3e5e111e421c71bbfa97c9867920402c98550b3330e3fa007b6062f, https://tracker.testerwork.com/video_files/952c9fca8e0d57920f00a1bd0749ede14c6a394cf9631f1abc0629e45aff60018c03e99bb1670f7ceb78625c9074a057

Test case id:


Country:
United States

Description:
Actual results
The phone verification is failed.  
Nothing happened after 2 attempts. And about 10 minutes later, the reminder message "Please connect your wallet"  was displayed.

Expected results
The phone verification is completed, and the wallet is connected. 



Environment:
platform_info: Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra, Android 12.0 12
operating_system: -
mobile_device_name: Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra
web_browser_and_version: -
operating_system_version: Android 12.0 12

Credentials:


Repro rate x5 1:

title: (Bug) 4.20.1 Notifications | Notifications loading improperly
description:
Users pointed out that the notifications aren't loading in 4.20 [here](https://www.minds.com/newsfeed/1317494592077041667)

I tested it, and when I pull down the notifications to reload, it won't load new messages, but if I switch to different category, they load.

![Example of the video](/uploads/626b6d656d55aa3756e809564b4cc931/vidma_recorder_14122021_163045.mp4)

Notifications title layout issue on small screens

### Steps to reproduce

- Open notifications screen on a device with a small screen

Set line numbers to 1 in the text component

description:
### Summary

In order to simplify the QA testing for each MR we need to make a new build for each branch

### Summary
We need to create a demo of the "Revised Mobile Navigation Proposal"
https://gitlab.com/minds/mobile-native/-/issues/3309

In order to test the idea on a device.

It should be as simple as possible, implementing the new navigation in broad strokes without polishing any details

title: Stuttering on the filter gallery(Android)
description:
<!---
Please read this!

Before opening a new issue, make sure to search for keywords in the issues
filtered by the "T - Bug" label and verify the issue you're about to submit isn't a duplicate.
--->

### Summary

Due to the flat list implementation on Android that has the removeClippingSubviews on by default, that the filters are slow, and a repeated scroll event bug. The Filter gallery has a lot of stuttering/glitches on android.

title: Fix android build pipeline
description: Currently our Android CI/CD pipeline is broken.

title: Discovery: Add "Top" tab (mobile app)
description:
In order to improve the quality of content on the Discovery page, and to drive engagement to our top content, we want to:

1. Add a new `Top` tab  to the Discovery page.
2. Use the feed powering the Guest Mode homepage to present posts in this `Top` feed.
3. Make `Top` the default tab when clicking the `Discovery` button in the Minds navigation.

Quick mock to illustrate:

![image](/uploads/51b51050d468b7edae4d5f52a1ba5c03/image.png)

- [ ] Follow experiment https://gitlab.com/minds/minds/-/issues/2869

title: Chosen browser is not remembered
description:
### Summary

(Summarize the bug encountered concisely)

### Steps to reproduce

Tap on a link, chose the browser
Close the app and open it again
Tap on a link it should remember the chosen browser and not ask again

title: Make a new test builld 4.20.0
description:
### Summary

Make test build for iOS and Android locally. CI build is broken for Android and image picker fails on iOS when the app is built on the CI

title: Native crash with new version of snowplow
description:
### Summary

FATAL EXCEPTION: OkHttp Dispatcher

java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: No virtual method toString(Z)Ljava/lang/String; in class Lokhttp3/Cookie; or its super classes (declaration of 'okhttp3.Cookie' appears in /data/app/~~YJO4_d2gHDNHk5P7_Ij8KQ==/com.minds.mobile-3lh7hgD_FNNolArskC8Muw==/base.apk!classes5.dex)

FATAL EXCEPTION: OkHttp Dispatcher
Process: com.minds.mobile, PID: 30202
java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: No virtual method toString(Z)Ljava/lang/String; in class Lokhttp3/Cookie; or its super classes (declaration of 'okhttp3.Cookie' appears in /data/app/~~YJO4_d2gHDNHk5P7_Ij8KQ==/com.minds.mobile-3lh7hgD_FNNolArskC8Muw==/base.apk!classes5.dex)
	at okhttp3.JavaNetCookieJar.saveFromResponse(JavaNetCookieJar.java:45)
	at com.facebook.react.modules.network.ReactCookieJarContainer.saveFromResponse(ReactCookieJarContainer.java:37)
	at okhttp3.internal.http.HttpHeaders.receiveHeaders(HttpHeaders.kt:207)
	at okhttp3.internal.http.BridgeInterceptor.intercept(BridgeInterceptor.kt:85)
	at okhttp3.internal.http.RealInterceptorChain.proceed(RealInterceptorChain.kt:109)
	at okhttp3.internal.http.RetryAndFollowUpInterceptor.intercept(RetryAndFollowUpInterceptor.kt:76)
	at okhttp3.internal.http.RealInterceptorChain.proceed(RealInterceptorChain.kt:109)
	at okhttp3.internal.connection.RealCall.getResponseWithInterceptorChain$okhttp(RealCall.kt:201)
	at okhttp3.internal.connection.RealCall$AsyncCall.run(RealCall.kt:517)
	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1167)
	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:641)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:923)

### Steps to reproduce

Log in with a user and it crashes after the request

### Platform information 
Android

title: Move @manishoo/react-native-modern-datepicker to a minds repo
description:
### Summary

In order to be able to edit the package, we should move it into a minds repo

title: Social Compass Mobile: No confirmation message that the questionnaire was submitted
description:
### Summary
When you submit the social compass questionnaire, there is no confirmation message that it has been successfully submitted.

### Steps to reproduce
1. Login to Minds.
2. Open the Social Compass from the Newsfeed page.
3. Answer all the questions.
4. Hit Save button.

### Platform information 
All web and mobile platforms

### What is the current *bug* behavior?
Currently, just navigates back to Newsfeed page.

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?
Confirmation text must appear when the questionnaire is submitted.

title: Discovery trending feed is not using the correct endpoint
description:
### Summary

The endpoint we are using for the trending feed on discovery is not returning the trending posts. We need to change it and point it to the correct endpoint.

title: Improve the composer filter view with a flatlist and a preview thumb
description:
### Summary

We can improve the performance and the UX by using a flat list and adding a horizontal preview thumb gallery

title: No ability to refresh comments on mobile
description: The normal expectation would be that users could pull to refresh posts. Currently when 'pulling to refresh' the comments pane simply closes. Furthermore, sockets are currently disabled. The only way a user to able to get fresh comments is to close, then re-open the comments pane.

title: Comment push notifications don't always redirect to the relevant question
description:
See steps below on replicating this issue.

- View comments on a given post
- Close the app
- When a new comment notification is received, tapping on it opens the app, but the redirection never happens.
- Also after receiving a push notification on an upvote, the direction never happens. The user simply remains on the original comment thread.

Please see video below.

![RecordIt-1638275199](/uploads/6fa81f8fc5f1cf2074364c75c139ec70/RecordIt-1638275199.MP4)

title: Update compass text and put it behind a FF
description:
### Summary

The compass is shown on mobile if the endpoint returns information and the endpoint is sending data even with the FF off

We need to update the texts according to https://gitlab.com/minds/minds/-/issues/2813

title: Add pseudo user id to snowplow and update  @snowplow/react-native-tracker
description: On login and register load the pseudo id from the minds_psuedoid cookie and set it as the snowplow user id. it should be persisted in the session

title: Regresion in composer bottom bar and floating input
description: both components are partially covered by the keyboard

The input is partially covered by the keyboard on iOS (comments)

description:
### Summary
The search cancel button is not aligned vertically on Android

title: Composer: last filter unusable

title: Composer: Use photo button stays in loading

title: Composer: camera doesn't close after posting
description: take a photo -> post it -> screen navigates to camera instead of feed

As I said in the mobile/design call, in order to be able to implement the proposed design for the autocomplete we need to detect the coordinates of the cursor.

In this task, I will test a possible workaround given that react-native doesn't have such functionality

https://gitlab.com/minds/mobile-native/-/issues/3567

title: The background of the plus icon in the portrait bar is hardcoded to white
Build test 4.20.0 for both platforms
description:

The Android build is failing on the CI so I need to build both platforms locally

title: Composer: unable to attach videos from the gallery
description:
### Summary

With the new composer, we lost the ability to attach videos from the gallery

It should use the 'mixed' option on iOS and show a prompt (Images/Videos) for android
